name: Dungeon Pest Control
description:
Welcome to 𝕯𝖚𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖔𝖓 𝕻𝖊𝖘𝖙 𝕮𝖔𝖓𝖙𝖗𝖔𝖑, a dungeon themed puzzle game.

More on Twitter | ottob.it

If you like what you see buy me a coffee

---------

You are a wizard who has embarked on a mission to clear the various dungeon rooms of their unwanted occupants.
Combine spells to take advantage of monsters' weaknesses and explore the secrets of the dungeon!

CONTROLS

ACTIONKEYSGAMEPADMove wizardLEFT / RIGHTLEFT / RIGHT Fire spellSPACE / Z / XA / BRotate CWE / DOWNRIGHT SHOULDERRotate CCWQ / UPLEFT SHOULDERResetENTER + SHIFTSTART + BACKFullscreenF-

Every enemy has its own weaknesses: pay attention to each spell's effect in order to maximize damage.
